verses.verse: And Naomi <S%H5281><s%> her mother-in <S%H2545><s%>-law said <S%H559><s%> unto her <S%H1323><s%>, My daughter, shall I not seek <S%H1245><s%> rest <S%H4494><s%> for thee <S%H3190><s%>, that it may be well with thee?

Wash <S%H7364><s%> thyself therefore <S%H5480><s%>, and anoint thee <S%H7760><s%>, and put thy raiment <S%H8071><s%> upon thee <S%H3381><s%>, and get thee down to the threshing-floor <S%H1637><s%>, but make not thyself known <S%H3045><s%> unto the man <S%H376><s%>, until he shall have done <S%H3615><s%> eating <S%H398><s%> and drinking <S%H8354><s%>.

And it shall be <S%H7901><s%>, when he lieth down, that thou shalt mark <S%H3045><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> where he shall lie <S%H7901><s%>, and thou shalt go in <S%H935><s%>, and uncover <S%H1540><s%> his feet <S%H4772><s%>, and lay thee down <S%H7901><s%>; and he will tell <S%H5046><s%> thee what thou shalt do <S%H6213><s%>.

And she went down <S%H3381><s%> unto the threshing-floor <S%H1637><s%>, and did <S%H6213><s%> according to all that her mother-in <S%H2545><s%>-law bade her <S%H6680><s%>.

And when Boaz <S%H1162><s%> had eaten <S%H398><s%> and drunk <S%H8354><s%>, and his heart <S%H3820><s%> was merry <S%H3190><s%>, he went <S%H935><s%> to lie down <S%H7901><s%> at the end <S%H7097><s%> of the heap of grain <S%H6194><s%>: and she came <S%H935><s%> softly <S%H3909><s%>, and uncovered <S%H1540><s%> his feet <S%H4772><s%>, and laid her down <S%H7901><s%>.

And it came to pass at midnight <S%H2677><s%>, that the man <S%H376><s%> was afraid <S%H2729><s%>, and turned <S%H3943><s%> himself <S%H802><s%>; and, behold, a woman lay <S%H7901><s%> at his feet <S%H4772><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%>, Who art thou <S%H559><s%>? And she answered, I am Ruth <S%H7327><s%> thy handmaid <S%H519><s%>: spread <S%H6566><s%> therefore thy skirt <S%H3671><s%> over thy handmaid <S%H519><s%>; for thou art a near kinsman <S%H1350><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%>, Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be thou of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, my daughter <S%H1323><s%>: thou hast showed <S%H3190><s%> more kindness <S%H2617><s%> in the latter end <S%H314><s%> than at the beginning <S%H7223><s%>, inasmuch as thou followedst <S%H3212><s%> not <S%H1115><s%> young men <S%H970><s%>, whether poor <S%H1800><s%> or rich <S%H6223><s%>.

And now <S%H1323><s%>, my daughter, fear <S%H3372><s%> not <S%H6213><s%>; I will do to thee all that thou sayest <S%H559><s%>; for all the city <S%H8179><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%> doth know <S%H3045><s%> that thou art a worthy <S%H2428><s%> woman <S%H802><s%>.
And now it is true <S%H551><s%> that I am a near kinsman <S%H1350><s%>; howbeit there is <S%H3426><s%> a kinsman <S%H1350><s%> nearer than I <S%H7138><s%>.

Tarry <S%H3885><s%> this night <S%H3915><s%>, and it shall be in the morning <S%H1242><s%>, that if he will perform unto thee the part of a kinsman <S%H1350><s%>, well <S%H2896><s%>; let him do the kinsman <S%H1350><s%>'s part: but if he will <S%H2654><s%> not do the part of a kinsman <S%H1350><s%> to thee <S%H1350><s%>, then will I do the part of a kinsman to thee <S%H3068><s%>, as Jehovah liveth <S%H2416><s%>: lie down <S%H7901><s%> until the morning <S%H1242><s%>.

And she rose up <S%H6965><s%> before <S%H2958><s%> one <S%H376><s%> could discern <S%H5234><s%> another <S%H7453><s%>. And he said <S%H559><s%>, Bring <S%H3051><s%> the mantle <S%H4304><s%> that is upon thee <S%H270><s%>, and hold it <S%H270><s%>; and she held it <S%H4058><s%>; and he measured six <S%H8337><s%> measures of barley <S%H8184><s%>, and laid <S%H7896><s%> it on her <S%H935><s%>: and he went into the city <S%H5892><s%>.

And she said <S%H559><s%>, These six <S%H8337><s%> measures of barley <S%H8184><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> he me <S%H559><s%>; for he said, Go <S%H935><s%> not empty <S%H7387><s%> unto thy mother-in <S%H2545><s%>-law.

Then said <S%H559><s%> she <S%H3427><s%>, Sit still, my daughter <S%H1323><s%>, until thou know <S%H3045><s%> how the matter <S%H1697><s%> will fall <S%H5307><s%>; for the man <S%H376><s%> will not rest <S%H8252><s%>, until <S%H518><s%> he have finished <S%H3615><s%> the thing <S%H1697><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%>.
